title: Newsworthy
provenance: Acquired directly from designer Lori Weitzner in 2010.
medium: Coiled newspaper, nylon filaments, paper backing
description: Strips of coiled newsprint are woven with nylon filaments on handlooms in the manner of grasscloth. Made from 100% recycled newsprint.
